titleStmt.title: Please to take notice that Tuesday the 4th. of February, 1689 between eleven and twelve a clock, is appointed a general court ...
titleStmt.author: Royal African Company.

notesStmt.note: A notice to vote for officers for the service of the Royal African Company.
Title taken from first lines of text.
Place of publication from Wing; date of publication, taken according to Lady Day dating, from title.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
